attributes.action: Raising the national speed limit on motorways from 70 mph to 80mph.
attributes.background: This petition is addressed to the Government for the reassessment of the national speed limit taking into account the monitoring of traffic on highways by the National Highway traffic control and the National Travel Survey Statistics with the possibility of increasing  from 70 mph to 80 mph.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640783
